Dialogue (en): Go get all the WEAPONS!!!
All the equipment being repaired is GOOOOOOOONE~~
My equipment is gone…
I’m finished…
All my magical tools have disappeared;;
It seems the market was completely robbed by thieves!
It’s been a while… APO
What!?
Why does my store look like this?
Haha… as long as I have my weapon… it’s fine..!
Unbelievable!!!
My three strongest weapons are gone…

Dialogue (kr):
무기를 되찾고 싶나!? (^.^)

그렇다면 
빙꽁 얼음 산맥으로 와라
Dialogue (en): Do you want to retrieve the weapons!? (^.^) Then come to the BingChiling Ice Mountain
After passing through the forest and the desert,
you’ll find the Ice Mountain
I’ve heard that monsters have become violent lately,
so be careful…
Trigger-specific slimes shoot liquid. Watch out.
Caw! Caw!
Died because I couldn’t double jump..OTL
Sometimes in life, you fall

Dialogue (kr): 보라색 마나를 다 모으면 W키로 체력을 회복할 수 있다.
Dialogue (en): If you collect all the purple mana, you can press W to recover your health.
I’m a good monster. Please don’t hit me.
Oh no..!!!
Why is this so heavy…??
You can’t pass beyond this point.
Why is he blocking my way?
To see if you’re worthy of taking the weapon…
I will confirm it.
Where are the rest of the weapons?
You must be crossing the desert by now…
Where are you taking my weapons?
You’ll find out at the end of this path.
When I retrieved the sword, it reminded me of that time…
Through the mana that holds my power…
if I right-click, a special attack is possible
What happens if I gather three mana orbs?
Hey!
Red bullets can be deflected!~

Dialogue (kr): 저한테 마우스를 조준하고 패링 연습을 해보세요!
Dialogue (en): Try aiming the mouse at me and practicing parrying!
Once you’ve practiced enough, let’s move to the right.
Ugh…
If you hit at the timing when the monster is about to attack…
What a terrible sight.
Finally, you’re here! My dear weapon merchant
I almost got a stiff neck waiting for you
Looks like you’ve already had a battle?
Well…

Dialogue (kr): 네가 오기 전에 재미 좀 봤지.
Dialogue (en): I had some fun before you arrived.
No need for introductions…
Let’s get right to it!!
I lost, I lost
Is this really the skill of a weapon merchant?
I can’t believe it
Did someone put you up to this?
That is…
I don’t really know either?

Dialogue (kr): 하지만 요즘 성 쪽이 시끄럽다는 건 알지.
Dialogue (en): But I know things have been noisy around the castle lately.
Could it be…?!
You can attack while moving with the gun

Dialogue (kr): 하지만 몇번 쏘면 장전을 해줘야 하지.
Dialogue (en): But you need to reload after a few shots.
Now that you have more than two weapons

Dialogue (kr): 연계 스킬을 사용 할 수 있어
Dialogue (en): You can use combo skills

Dialogue (kr): 공격하는 잠깐의 타이밍에 무기 교체를 해주면?
Dialogue (en): If you switch weapons at the moment of attack?

Dialogue (kr): 연계 스킬이 나가니까 적재적소에 활용해야 해
Dialogue (en): You can use combo skills, so you need to utilize them appropriately
We’re almost there
But something feels off

Dialogue (kr): 단단한 얼음은 총알로는 부술 수 없다.
Dialogue (en): Solid ice cannot be broken with bullets.
You’re really making things tough for me
Why are you doing this to me?
Haha, do you feel more alert now?
Shall we end this here?
Hammer obtained!!
Finally, I got all my weapons back
The reason you stole my weapons…
There are too many suspicious points
Be honest. What’s your real goal?

Dialogue (kr): 지금… 이 뒤쪽 성 아래에서 뭔가가 깨어나고 있어
Dialogue (en): Now… something is awakening below this castle

Dialogue (kr): 세 무기의 힘을 다룰 수 있는 용사만이
Dialogue (en): Only a hero who can wield the power of these three weapons
Can stop it, they said.
You were that hero from the past.
Yes…
I stole the weapons for this…
But
What if I don’t want to fight?
Please… stop the mad king
APO… with your power…
Quietly living is now over…
Finally, I gathered all the weapons!
The hammer is slow but can deal strong attacks
Let’s practice combo skills thoroughly before moving on
Who are you! Reveal your identity!
I am just an ordinary merchant.
I want to meet the king.

Dialogue (kr): 지금은 성에 아무도 들어갈 수 없다.
Dialogue (en): No one can enter the castle right now.
I see, haha…
In that case…
First form of the reckless breath
Just charge
… There are so many
Stop the intruder!!!
Hmm… Who is it?
I definitely entered the castle…
..? How did you get here?

Dialogue (kr): 설마 나의 기사들을 전부 쓰러뜨린 건가?
Dialogue (en): Did you defeat all my knights?
Tsk..! Knights are useless…
You plan to awaken “that” in the basement of the castle?
Do you intend to destroy the world?
Destroy?
How could you say such a scary thing..?

Dialogue (kr): 난 더럽혀진 이 세계를 청소하려는 것 뿐이야
Dialogue (en): I just intend to clean this tainted world
And…
Let’s use the splendid word revolution.
Indeed, I must remove you now.
And so, the battle with the king began.

Dialogue (kr): 이후 치열한 공방이 오가며 싸움은 끝나게 되는데
Dialogue (en): After intense exchanges, the battle ended
When you think it’s all over with the king’s death.
The king revived!
And taunted me to follow him…
Wait a minute…!
Do you really intend to break the seal!?

Dialogue (kr): Yeah. 이제 이 봉인석만 뜯어내면 모든게 끝난다.
Dialogue (en): Yeah. Once I remove this seal stone, everything will end.
Haha…!!
Now, this world is finished.
Everyone will die.
Kahahaha
It was a terrible time.
But the seal stone is now gone..!

Dialogue (kr): 이번에야말로 이 대마왕 Glint님께서 손수 세상을 멸해주마..!!
Dialogue (en): This time, I, the Great Demon Lord Glint, will personally destroy the world..!!
Oh, am I being ignored..?
Huh..? Are you.. that hero from that time..?!
Yes.
You… this time, I will definitely kill you..!!!
I will show you the difference in power!!
Ugh…
This can’t be
I prepared and revived over a long time…
Why am I losing..!?
Because now, I am stronger than anyone

Dialogue (kr): 크흐흐.. 하지만 아직 싸움은 끝나지 않았다.
Dialogue (en): Hehe… but the fight isn’t over yet.
Haha…!! Then die!!
Argh… Is this the end…
Don’t give up!
We haven’t lost yet.
Let’s combine the power of the three of us
APO!! Let’s destroy him!!
Press the right mouse button!
Tri"Apo"wer!!!!
